events.message: We received the application for the Senior Software Engineer position from the candidate today, showing strong interest in our engineering team.
The candidate's profile has been categorized under Engineering after noting relevant software development experience and skills in backend technologies.
A recruiter specializing in Engineering roles has been assigned to follow up with the applicant and coordinate the screening process promptly.
Conducted an initial screening call with the candidate to assess technical background, communication skills, and overall fit for the software engineering position.
The candidate responded enthusiastically, expressing eagerness to proceed to the technical interview stage and discussing availability for next week.
A technical interview has been successfully scheduled with the engineering panel for May 7th, focusing on software development and system design topics.
The candidate completed the technical interview showing strong problem-solving skills and solid knowledge of backend systems and coding best practices.
Following a positive technical round, the HR interview has been scheduled to discuss cultural fit, benefits, and compensation expectations.
The HR interview was completed successfully with good rapport. The candidate expressed alignment with company values and interest in the role.
An offer has been proposed to the candidate including details about salary, benefits, and onboarding process for the engineering position.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed excitement about the opportunity to join our engineering team.
The candidate officially accepted the offer, confirming their commitment to join the company and start the onboarding process soon.
The onboarding process has started for the new software engineer, including training sessions, paperwork completion, and team introductions.
The hiring process has been successfully closed with the candidate fully integrated into the engineering team and actively contributing.
